html: Grand Master Jhoon Rhee died last evening and his passing is a loss for our nation. Known as the “Father of Taekwando” in America Master Rhee instructed Muhammad Ali, Bruce Lee, and I’m proud to say that he was my Grand Master. #espyforsenatepic.twitter.com/LsnpB43qVL

html: Dying last night at age 86, he almost made it. In his honor I recommend his book: Trutopia: The Taekwando Philosophy. Hope of Healing the World.  He led by example. Rest well my friend, my Grand Master, Korea’s great gift to the United States. #espyforsenate #mikeespy #riseabovepic.twitter.com/unfslvpTJq
